title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. II, pt. 53 - Outsiders Visiting Or Applying For Entrance To Institutions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. II, pt. 53 - Outsiders Visiting Or Applying For Entrance To Institutions

State Regulations
§ 53.1 - Solicitors must obtain permission
§ 53.2 - Requests for group visitation
§ 53.3 - No interviews after office hours
§ 53.4 - Repealed
§ 53.5 - Exchange of articles between visitor and inmate
§ 53.6 - Report of entering nonemployees
§ 53.7 - Persons seeking admission must report business
§ 53.8 - Restrictions on entrance of nonemployees
§ 53.9 - Intoxicated persons prohibited
§ 53.10 - Permitted visitors during disturbances or riots
§ 53.11 - Vehicle drivers to produce license
§ 53.12 - Employee to accompany entering vehicles
§ 53.13 - Gate supervisor may search persons
§ 53.14 - Record of visitors allowed by law
§ 53.15 - Visits to patients
§ 53.16 - Violation of visiting rules

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. II, pt. 53

Statutory authority: Correction Law, §112

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
